backend/main.mo: Defines canister state and logic for users, classes, sessions, bookings, video lessons, and contact inquiries with access‑controlled CRUD operations.
feature_evidence.json: Describes a feature request to update Bharatnatyam dropdown text and lists affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files including components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining color variables, themes, and global styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing the root element and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, authentication checks, and global UI elements like header, footer, and profile dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access‑denied page with messaging and a button to navigate home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Displays a login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a user profile with name/email fields and mutation logic to save the profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/Registratio: User registration form that validates input and saves a new user profile via mutation, showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Gate component that restricts access to admin-only routes, showing a loading spinner or an access denied screen.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Button that triggers session booking, prompting login if needed and showing toast notifications for success or failure.
Per-booking reminder component that periodically checks upcoming session times and shows toast reminders based on user settings.
Global reminder manager that iterates over user bookings to evaluate reminder settings, with session data fetching left unimplemented.
frontend/src/components/classes/ClassEdi: Dialog for creating a new dance class with fields for details and validation, submitting via a create class mutation.
frontend/src/components/instructor/Sessi: Static panel prompting instructors to select a session to view its roster.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer displaying site links, credits, and instructor bio with contact information.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Navigation header component showing links and role‑based menu options with authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/lessons/LessonEd: Dialog form for creating a new video lesson and submitting it via an upload mutation.
frontend/src/components/payments/PayForB: Button that creates a Stripe checkout session for a booking and redirects the user to the payment URL.
frontend/src/components/search/StyleFilt: Displays a summary of filtered results by dance style with an option to clear the filter.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Dialog form for scheduling a new class session using selected class details and submitting it via a mutation.
frontend/src/constants/classLevels.ts: Defines class level constants and their TypeScript type.
frontend/src/constants/danceStyles.ts: Defines available dance styles, metadata options, and a helper to look up descriptions.
frontend/src/constants/sampleVideoLesson: Provides a list of sample video lesson data used for seeding the library.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddSampleVideoLess: Hook that adds sample video lessons if missing, with progress and error tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingDetails.ts: Hook that fetches session and class details for a given booking and returns combined loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookingReminderSet: Manages per-booking reminder settings with localStorage persistence and provides hooks to read/update them.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerRole.ts: Fetches the caller's user role and admin status using react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Retrieves the current user's profile via actor.getCallerUserProfile with loading state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an authentication context backed by Internet Identity, handling login, logout, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for CRUD operations on classes, sessions, bookings, videos, users, contact inquiries, and related actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripeCheckout.ts: Creates Stripe checkout sessions and queries session status through actor methods.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for theming in light and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering React with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminInquiriesP: Displays, sorts, and renders contact inquiries in an admin view with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRegistrati: Lists registered users for admins with role badges, table display, and loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRoleManage: Provides a UI for admins to view their role and assign roles to users by principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/admin/PaymentSetupPag: Shows Stripe configuration status and allows admins to submit secret keys and allowed countries.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RegisterPage.tsx: Handles user registration flow with Internet Identity login and displays registration or account status.
frontend/src/pages/biodata/BiodataPage.t: Displays a static biodata page with portrait, summary, and competencies of an instructor.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Shows a logged-in user's bookings with status badges and renders detailed booking cards.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/CatalogPage.t: Displays a searchable and filterable list of dance classes with style and level filters and navigates to class details.
frontend/src/pages/catalog/ClassDetailPa: Shows detailed information for a selected dance class and lists upcoming sessions with booking options.
frontend/src/pages/contact/ContactPage.t: Provides a contact form with validation to submit inquiries and displays success or error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/gallery/GalleryPage.t: Empty placeholder page for a gallery view.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/Instructor: Instructor dashboard for managing classes and sessions, including creating and viewing existing entries.
frontend/src/pages/instructor/ManageLess: Allows instructors to manage video lessons, add new lessons, and optionally load sample lessons.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonDe: Displays detailed information and video playback for a specific video lesson with navigation back to the lessons list.
frontend/src/pages/lessons/VideoLessonsP: Displays video lessons with search and style filtering, fetching data and showing results or loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Shows a payment‑cancelled message with navigation buttons to bookings or home.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Shows a payment‑success message and invalidates booking/session queries before offering navigation options.
frontend/src/pages/testimonials/Testimon: Renders testimonials with a category filter derived from testimonial metadata.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates and downloads ICS calendar files using event details with proper formatting and escaping.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, and pending requests for updating Bharatnatyam dropdown text.
